summary: This document is an invoice from FedEx addressed to Jeffrey E. Epstein for shipping services. It details the charges incurred for a shipment picked up on October 7, 2004, and includes information about discounts and total charges due by November 16, 2004.

keyFacts: The invoice is dated November 1, 2004, and is for a total of $39.57.
The invoice includes a shipping charge of $30.00 and special handling charges of $12.57.
The payment for the invoice is due by November 16, 2004.
The package was picked up on October 7, 2004, and delivered on October 8, 2004.
There are references to discounts applied to the charges.
